msContents.summary: This amsnuscript has two texts. first one commentary Pradipikā and the second is the list of Āpastambhagṛhyasūtra. It seems that it is a cryptic commentary on the Āpastambhagṛhyasūtra. 1st blank folio after the cover has something written in Telugu.

msItem.title: Pradīpikā
msItem.incipit: t1-[1v]1 atha karmmāṇyācarādyāni gṛhyante athātrānāntarācārādyāni gṛhyante karmāṇi jāyante kartavyena . tāni kāryāṇi kuru t1-[1v]2 ta udagayānādayaḥ prasiddhāḥ . puṇyāhastu devasya savituḥ prātaḥ prasvaḥ prāṇa ityasminnuvāke pañcapūrṇāha uktāḥ .
msItem.explicit: t1-73v 4bhiruktiḥ . thatra ślokaḥ anuktamabhyuktamayuktaṃ yuktaṃ vyaktoktarottabahuyuktivṛttaṃ . tat sarvamāryaiḥ pariśo t1-73v 5 dhaniyaṃ gṛhyaprayogādvyatibandhanañca . ityaṣṭamaḥ paṭalaḥ eṣātraividhyavṛddhena tālavṛnta t1-73v 6 nivāsinā somapena kṛtā vṛttiḥ praogasyapradīpikā .. hariḥ oṃ kaakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ .. t1-73v 7 hariḥ oṃ

msItem.title: Āpastambhagṛhyasūtra

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 02 pp:126-127 VHOD Vol II.6 p-699 entry:2017

msItem.incipit: t2-1v 1 atha karmāṇyācārādyāni gṛhyanta udagahayanapūrvapakṣāḥ puṇyāheṣu kāryāṇi yajñopavitināprakṣiṇaṃ pu t2-1v 2 rastātudagvopakramastathāpavargoparapakṣepitryāṇi prācīnā vitinā prasavyaṃ dakṣiṇato pavargo t2-1v 3 nimittāvekṣāṇi naimittikānya….
msItem.explicit: t2-25r-4kṣiṇāpratyat pravaṇaṃ māsiśrāddhasyāṣṭau …. atha karmāṇi paridhīndayānidayāti .. hariḥ oṃ
msItem.colophon: t2-25r-5 karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ . svabhānuvarṣaṃ aḍimāsi 6 tethi veṃkaṭeśena likhitaḥ . hariḥ oṃ

extent.measure: 4 blank folio 2 guard folio and t1-73, t2-24

supportDesc.foliation: First folio without numbering. Tamil numerals in the left margin on the verso of the folio. Both the texts has separate numbering.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ and śubhamastu is written in the left margin on t1-1v and t2-1v.

origin.origDate: According to colophon this manuscript could be written approximately between 1703-1704 - 1883-1884, between mid-July to mid-August, day resembling to the 6th day of the Āshāḍha month of the Hindu calendar.
